title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: It can be wildly tempting to check good manners at the gate when entering a competitive arena today. But there are benefits to being polite, even when in the heat of a rivalry. At the very least, the view from the high road is broad and inclusive. The more you see, the more you know. And lets face it, you are extremely talented at using every tidbit of knowledge to your advantage. Give it your best and when all is said and done, shake hands. Being a class act is always in style. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
